@@ -1,9 +1,9 @@
 <div class="project-list">
     <mat-card *ngFor="let project of projects">
       <mat-card-title>{{ project.name }}</mat-card-title>
       <mat-card-subtitle>{{ project.client }}</mat-card-subtitle>
-      <mat-progress-bar mode="determinate" [value]="project.progress"></mat-progress-bar>
+      
       <mat-progress-bar mode="determinate" [value]="selectedProject?.progress || 0"></mat-progress-bar>
 
       <button mat-button (click)="selectedProject = project">View Details</button>
     </mat-card>
